com.pcloud.sdk

Interface RemoteFolder

  • All Superinterfaces:
    RemoteEntry

    public interface RemoteFolder
extends RemoteEntry
    An abstraction over a file entry for a folder on a pCloud account's filesystem.
    See Also:
    RemoteEntry, RemoteFile

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int ROOT_FOLDER_ID
      The id of a pCloud account's filesystem root folder.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<RemoteEntry> children() 
      boolean delete(boolean recursively)
      Delete this folder.
      long folderId() 
      RemoteFolder reload()
      Reload this folder.
      RemoteFolder reload(boolean recursively)
      Reload this folder.

      • Methods inherited from interface com.pcloud.sdk.RemoteEntry

        asFile, asFolder, copy, copy, created, delete, id, isFile, isFolder, lastModified, move, name, parentFolderId, rename

    • Field Detail

      • ROOT_FOLDER_ID

        static final int ROOT_FOLDER_ID
        The id of a pCloud account's filesystem root folder.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • folderId

        long folderId()
        Returns:
        the folderId for this folder.

      • children

        java.util.List<RemoteEntry> children()
        Returns:
        the folder's children. Cannot be null.

      • reload

        RemoteFolder reload()
             throws java.io.IOException
        Reload this folder.

        Same as calling reload(boolean) with recursively argument set to false.

        Returns:
        a new, updated RemoteFolder instance
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - on a network or API error.
        See Also:
        ApiClient.listFolder(long)

      • reload

        RemoteFolder reload(boolean recursively)
             throws java.io.IOException
        Reload this folder.
        Parameters:
        recursively - if true, a full folder tree will be returned, otherwise the resulting folder will contain only its direct children
        Returns:
        a new, updated RemoteFolder instance
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - on a network or API error.
        See Also:
        ApiClient.listFolder(long, boolean)

      • delete

        boolean delete(boolean recursively)
        throws java.io.IOException
        Delete this folder.
        Parameters:
        recursively - If set to true all child files will also be deleted.

        If set to false, the operation will fail on any non-empty folder

        Returns:
        true if the operation is successful, false otherwise
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - on a null file argument.
        java.io.IOException - on a network or API error.
        See Also:
        ApiClient.deleteFolder(RemoteFolder, boolean)
